AttackerCapabilities: Ability to analyze and modify code

Steps.Description: Download app.py and examine the render function

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker wants to understand how the application handles rendering and if there are any potential vulnerabilities.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker downloads the app.py file and analyzes the render function.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker discovers that the render function is vulnerable to template injection when passing things in the textbox.

Steps.Description: Determine that template injection is possible when passing things in the textbox

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that they can inject malicious code through the textbox to exploit the template injection vulnerability.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker tests injecting {{ state.flag }} in the textbox.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully injects the code and gets the flag: magpie{tr34ty0ur1nt3rn5_n1c3ly}
